item.title: How Mixed Models Can Boost your Taco Business
item.description: Introduction & Least Squares A Smarter Approach: Mixed Models Bibliography Little note: the data presented below is simulated for the sake of the example Second little note: I assume you have intermediate knowledge of statistics/econometrics, basic microeconomics background helps to fully understand. Introduction & Least Squares Imagine that your family have been already in the taco business for a while and you just graduated from Economics or Stats programme.
